    Distributed Storage Research


    Distributed Storage Research (DSR) team leverages its knowledge of storage, operating, and distributed systems to empower cloud computing, high-performance computing, and AI ecosystems. Our research aims to create efficient, scalable, resilient, and secure storage solutions to handle the rapid growth of digital information and the diverse requirements of various applications and infrastructures.

    About us

    Research Topics

    Our research is directed towards building efficient, reliable, and secure storage systems.
